alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 10:47PM AKST until January 14 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...LONG DURATION SNOW EVENT FOR THIS WEEKEND... .Light snow has begun and will continue into the weekend across the northern panhandle. Snowfall rates will gradually increase in intensity through the weekend as well. Snow has started dry and fluffy but may become wetter and heavier as temperatures warm through the weekend. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM SATURDAY TO 4 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 14 to 18 inches. Twelve hour snow rates of around 6 inches. * WHERE...Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait including Elfin Cove and Pelican. * WHEN...From 3 AM Saturday to 4 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow may start as dry and light but is expected to become wetter and heavier as temperatures warm into Saturday night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather.
